column2.title: How it works
description: Let us guide you from A to Z

slider1.title: Astor Protect Management Platform
slider1.description: Astor protect is much more than a cloud management platform for video surveillance and remote monitoring, access control. We offer the best solution for proactive video surveillance, Pointer by facial recognition and unprecedented business intelligence analyzes in the areas: Stores, Shopping centers, Autogare and Railway Station, Public Establishments, Manufacturing plants, School, Banking Sector, Offices and Building, Hotels, Hospitals and Healthcare Facility, Ports and Shipyards, Petroleum depot and service station, Theaters and theaters, Museums, religious institutions, exhibition centers and congresses.

slider2.title: Protection 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
slider2.description: Ensure the highest level of security on 24/7 with the latest technology in the security market. Through intelligent video analysis, proactive and remote video surveillance. The solution sends notifications in real time when something happens, allowing a more intervention to any situation

slider3.title: The highest level of security of your video data
slider3.description: Your data containing your evidence of intrusion or aggression can not be stolen or damaged. We guarantee the highest level of security of your data. We work with highly secure data centers based in each country we cover.

column1.title: Analysis on request
column1.description: We offer a wide range of analysis to make proactive security and data of your different business areas by making them relevant. Thanks to the service model, you can apply to adjust the features at any time and according to your needs of the moment you only pay for the analyzes used

column2.title: Integration with our alarm monitoring centers
column2.description: The ASTOR PROTECT remote monitoring offer is an effective solution for securing your home against theft by completely delegating your security to certified operators. The surveillance cameras are connected to a central monitoring station that processes all the alarms and takes the necessary measures to protect you 24 hours a day: immediately contact an authorized security agent and contact the competent authorities on a priority number. In addition to remote monitoring, you have access to all CCTV services.

column3.title: Deploying a single site to multiple
column3.description: Our solution is accessible and cost-effective for a camera site as well as for multi-site international companies with hundreds of cameras. Our service model allows a complete adaptation of the deployment.

description.title: Security at the heart of your business
description.item: ASTOR PROTECT has created cloud physical security offerings. These services apply to presence control and video surveillance. We enable security systems to become more reliable, more secure, more agile.

items: Flexible To adapt to the evolution of each client

column1.title: Smart smoke detector
column1.description: In case of fire, the Intelligent Smoke Detector triggers an alarm of 85 dB and sends a real-time alert to our monitoring center and those of your family members, wherever you are.

column2.title: Distinction of forms
column2.description: Intelligent Detection with Image Analysis Motion-sensing cameras are equipped with a pattern recognition technology that recognizes humans, animals, cars and other movements. No more false detections with our advanced detection technology. Compatible with pets and outdoor ambient noise. Intelligent Sensing with Image Analysis Motion Detection Cameras are equipped with a pattern recognition technology that recognizes humans, animals, cars of others movements. No more false detections with our advanced detection technology. Compatible with pets and outdoor ambient noise.

column3.title: Remote monitoring
column3.description: Real-time management of alerts by the remote monitoring center Processing alerts between 30 and 80 seconds You can leave the peace of mind! Any unusual event generates an alert at the central monitoring station 24/7 to identify the cause of the trigger: attempted break-in by a burglar, triggering the motion detector, smoke, CO2 or disconnection of surveillance cameras.

description.item: Protect people and property with a security system you can rely on. From the simplest installations to the most complex projects, we offer integrated solutions based on proven technology and unparalleled technical support.

We are witnessing a generalization of this very popular safety device. This security system has many advantages. Contact an ASTOR PROTECT professional today to benefit from incomparable know-how and experience. We take care of the installation and maintenance of your CCTV systems

column1.title: A strong dissuasive power
column1.description: By installing CCTV cameras, you give potential intruders a strong signal: your site is under protection. This security feature discourages many malicious individuals.

column2.title: Time saving
column2.description: The intelligent features of our video surveillance systems give you direct access to the time and day of your interest. You can easily export on the usb key the sequence (s) of your choice.

column3.title: 360 ° vision

column2.title: Legal evidence

page3.title: Discover how the Astor Protect service works in the event of a break in your home

description: I leave my house and activate activity detection mode
The presence of an intruder is detected
A video is registered and is available 30 days on your customer area
The monitoring stations receive the alerts
You delegate your security to professionals while keeping access to video surveillance services
The central monitoring station processes the alert, 24/7, and carries out the video doubt in real time
If the doubt is positive or if the doubt persists, the monitoring center sends an authorized safety officer on site free of charge.
The break-in is proven: Priority police call
The remote monitoring center contacts the police on a priority number to intervene as quickly as possible
The central monitoring station warns you and sends an agent to keep your home free for 3 hours

column1.title: Intelligent video surveillance with human recognition
column1.description: The Astor Protect video surveillance offer is a solution that allows you to protect your home yourself and interact with your home remotely. The surveillance cameras alert you in real time in case of an event at your home - as an intrusion - and allow you to react very quickly with video evidence to support. The ASTOR PROTECT video surveillance application gives you all the tools to efficiently secure your home, remotely monitor your home and react quickly.

column2.title: 24/7 next generation remote monitoring
column2.description: The Astor Protect remote monitoring offer is an effective solution to secure your home against theft by completely delegating your security to certified operators. The surveillance cameras are connected to a central monitoring station that processes all the alarms and takes the necessary measures to protect you 24 hours a day: immediately contact an authorized security agent and contact the competent authorities on a priority number. In addition to remote monitoring, you have access to all CCTV services.

page1.title: The only remote monitoring system for the home including smart cameras and smart smoke detectors.

popOver.title: Learn More
popOver.description: The security of your home delegated to a remote monitoring center, and video surveillance services to remotely monitor your home and interact with your home in video and audio at any time.ASTOR PROTECT to its own remote monitoring platform for the treatment of alerts Anti-intrusion monitoring center based in Cameroon meets all the requirements of this standard which guarantees the quality of services against intrusion.

column1.title: See, hear and talk
column1.description: Because it's important that you stay in control of your home day and night, Astor Protect HD cameras incorporate a microphone and a speaker to let you hear and chat with your loved ones in your home. At any time check if your alarm is active, and switch it on remotely if necessary. When at home, use privacy mode to preserve your privacy.

column2.title: Real-time management of alerts by the central monitoring station
column2.description: Treatment of alerts between 30 and 80 seconds. You can leave the peace of mind! Any unusual event generates an alert at the central monitoring station 24/7 to identify the cause of the trigger: attempted break-in by a burglar, triggering the motion detector, smoke, CO2 or disconnection of surveillance cameras. As soon as an alert is received, the monitoring center views the automatic video surveillance recordings to analyze the content and react effectively. You can also decide to receive alerts sent to the monitoring center directly to your ASTOR PROTECT account.

column3.title: Intervention of an unlimited security agent at your home
column3.description: Agent departures on the territory. In case of break-in or doubt, ASTOR PROTECT sends a security guard to your address to check the condition of the issues or the presence of an intruder. ASTOR PROTECT has the largest network of security agents, with several bases of departure on the territory, so you can benefit from a quick intervention of a security officer.In your absence, if the break-in of the home is proven, the guarding of the place is provided for 3 hours, the time for you to re-secure the home

column4.title: Your mobile application
column4.description: No more alarm panels! Easily find all your events in video from your application or within your customer area. The cameras are smart and know how to recognize a human, an animal and a vehicle for a personalized and intelligent detection. View, download or delete the recordings of your video surveillance very simply. Contact the monitoring center 24/7. contact with the operator of the central monitoring station at any time.

column5.title: Smart Smoke Detector
column5.description: Alerts on your smartphone and 10 years of battery * to better protect your home. In case of fire, the Intelligent Smoke Detector triggers an alarm of 85 dB and sends a real-time alert to your smartphone and those of your family members, wherever you are. You can always count on your Smart Smoke Detector Astor Protect. Unlike conventional smoke detectors, the ASTOR PROTECT Intelligent Smoke Detector alerts you in real time on your smartphone in the event of a fire in your home. You can even intervene when you are not at home.
